eu.amidst.core.distribution

Class Normal_MultinomialNormalParents

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.distribution.Distribution
      • eu.amidst.core.distribution.ConditionalDistribution
        • eu.amidst.core.distribution.Normal_MultinomialNormalParents
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Normal_MultinomialNormalParents
extends ConditionalDistribution
    This class extends the abstract class ConditionalDistribution. It defines the conditional distribution of a variable with a Normal distribution given a set of Multinomial and Normal parents.

    For an example of use follow this link

    http://amidst.github.io/toolbox/CodeExamples.html#bnmodifyexample

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Normal_MultinomialNormalParents

        public Normal_MultinomialNormalParents(BaseDistribution_MultinomialParents<ConditionalLinearGaussian> base_)
        Creates a new Normal_MultinomialNormalParents distribution for a given BaseDistribution_MultinomialParents<ConditionalLinearGaussian>.
        Parameters:
        base_ - an array of Normal_NormalParents objects, one for each configuration of the Multinomial parents.

      • Normal_MultinomialNormalParents

        public Normal_MultinomialNormalParents(Variable var1,
                                       List<Variable> parents1)
        Creates a new Normal_MultinomialNormalParents distribution for a given Variable and its parents.
        Parameters:
        var1 - the variable of the distribution.
        parents1 - the set of parents of this variable.

    • Method Detail

      • getNormal_NormalParentsDistribution

        public ConditionalLinearGaussian getNormal_NormalParentsDistribution(Assignment assignment)
        Returns a ConditionalLinearGaussian distribution given an assignment over a set of Multinomial parents. Assuming that X and Y are two sets of Normal variables, and Z is a set of Multinomial variables, this method computes P(X|Y,Z=z).
        Parameters:
        assignment - An assignment over a set of parents. For generality reasons, apart from the Multinomial parents, the assignment also contains values for the Normal parents (although they are not used in this case).
        Returns:
        a ConditionalLinearGaussian distribution.

      • getNormal_NormalParentsDistribution

        public ConditionalLinearGaussian getNormal_NormalParentsDistribution(int position)
        Returns a ConditionalLinearGaussian distribution given an input position in the array of distributions.
        Parameters:
        position - a position in the array of distributions.
        Returns:
        a ConditionalLinearGaussian distribution.

      • setNormal_NormalParentsDistribution

        public void setNormal_NormalParentsDistribution(int position,
                                                ConditionalLinearGaussian distribution)
        Sets a ConditionalLinearGaussian distribution to a given position in the array of distributions.
        Parameters:
        position - the position in which the distribution is set.
        distribution - a ConditionalLinearGaussian distribution.

      • setNormal_NormalParentsDistribution

        public void setNormal_NormalParentsDistribution(Assignment assignment,
                                                ConditionalLinearGaussian distribution)
        Sets a ConditionalLinearGaussian distribution to the array of distributions in a position determined by a given Assignment. Note that this assignment also contains values for the Normal parents (although they are not used in this case).
        Parameters:
        assignment - an Assignment for the parent variables.
        distribution - a ConditionalLinearGaussian distribution.

      • equalDist

        public boolean equalDist(Distribution dist,
                         double threshold)
        Tests if a given distribution is equal to this Distribution. Two distributions are considered equal if the difference is lower than a given threshold.
        Specified by:
        equalDist in class Distribution
        Parameters:
        dist - a Distribution object.
        threshold - a threshold.
